label: Behavior 13248396
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving west-southwest, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 57.7621 - 0.0044 × t, lon(t) ≈ 10.0390 - 0.0138 × t, where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
